messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: On January 8, DET. M. N. Clarke responded to an assault at Sunset Park. Principal informants were Dr. Reed, an on-site medic, and Ms. Fisher, a witness. FORWARD COPY TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION. INFORMANT DOCS. Lt. O. P. Davis - OPERATIONS Det. Clarke, Sr. .. INVESTIGATIONS. Detective Q. R. Smith and Detective S. T. Thompson joined for gathering evidence. BLACK 21:25 Assault Dr. Reed provided medical details of the injured party, while Ms. Fisher described the assailant. Evidence. Technician Xavier collected belongings left at the scene. CONTINUED FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION 3- STATUS [CHECK ONE] Det. Clarke Sr, Det. Smith, Det. Thompson OPERATIONS Lt. Davis INFORMANT Fisher, Natalie 75 Birch Boulevard, Sunset, Texas 195-860. 94145. BLACK 21:25 Assault By 11:40 PM, Detectives Clarke, Smith, and Thompson, with Lieutenant Davis' guidance, generated a suspect composite. Captain U. V. Miller initiated a park patrol increase. Sergeant W. X. Norris and Sergeant Y. Z. Owen reviewed recent incidents for patterns. By 1:10 AM, a suspect was identified from previous records. FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION 3- STATUS [CHECK ONE] Det. Clarke Sr, Det. Smith, Det. Thompson OPERATIONS Lt. Davis AFFIDAVIT - Assault Report 1) Medical Report 2) Witness Statements 3) F.I.R. 4) Found Belongings 5) Park CCTV (6) Other Details LINE UP INFO ASSISTANT CHIEF DEPUTY IN CHARGE P. Green S.P.P.D. 30.120 P70 3275 Reed, JONATHAN NAME: ADDRESS: TELEPHONE: 180-3575 DETECTIVE: M. CLARKE ITEM: 70-5450- 107 CRIME: 21:25 IDENTIFICATION NUMBER 84170 - CONFIRMED John Doe DATE 7/15/24 FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION CONTINUED.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: DET. M. N. Clarke  Officer Context: On January 8, DET. M. N. Clarke responded to an assault at Sunset Park. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Lt. O. P. Davis  Officer Context: Lt. O. P. Davis - OPERATIONS Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Detective Q. R. Smith  Officer Context: Detective Q. R. Smith and Detective S. T. Thompson joined for gathering evidence. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective S. T. Thompson  Officer Context: Detective Q. R. Smith and Detective S. T. Thompson joined for gathering evidence. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Technician Xavier  Officer Context: Evidence. Technician Xavier collected belongings left at the scene. Officer Role: Technician (from the Crime Lab) Officer Name: Detective Clarke  Officer Context: By 11:40 PM, Detectives Clarke, Smith, and Thompson, with Lieutenant Davis' guidance, generated a suspect composite. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective Smith  Officer Context: By 11:40 PM, Detectives Clarke, Smith, and Thompson, with Lieutenant Davis' guidance, generated a suspect composite. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective Thompson  Officer Context: By 11:40 PM, Detectives Clarke, Smith, and Thompson, with Lieutenant Davis' guidance, generated a suspect composite. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Captain U. V. Miller  Officer Context: Captain U. V. Miller initiated a park patrol increase. Officer Role: Captain Officer Name: Sergeant W. X. Norris  Officer Context: Sergeant W. X. Norris and Sergeant Y. Z. Owen reviewed recent incidents for patterns. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sergeant Y. Z. Owen Officer Context: Sergeant W. X. Norris and Sergeant Y. Z. Owen reviewed recent incidents for patterns. Officer Role: Sergean
